Class SimpleBoard

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.game.board.SimpleBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Board, ClearableBoard, MovableBoard, ScorableBoard, SpawnableBoard
public class SimpleBoard extends Object implements Board
Concrete board implementation. Uses Factory pattern for brick generation and implements Board interface to allow different board implementations through polymorphism.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimpleBoard

      public SimpleBoard(int width, int height)
      Creates a new SimpleBoard with the specified dimensions. Uses Factory pattern to create brick generator - generator is created through factory rather than directly instantiated, following Dependency Inversion.
      Parameters:
      width - the board width
      height - the board height

    • holdBrick

      public ViewData holdBrick()
      Description copied from interface: SpawnableBoard
      Holds the current brick or swaps with the held brick. If no brick is held, stores the current brick and spawns a new one. If a brick is already held, swaps the current brick with the held brick. Can only be called when the current brick has not yet been merged to the background.
      Specified by:
      holdBrick in interface SpawnableBoard
      Returns:
      ViewData containing updated brick information after the hold operation

    • createSnapshot

      public BoardStateSnapshot createSnapshot()
      Captures a snapshot of the current board state for undo functionality.
      Returns:
      immutable snapshot of the current state

    • restoreSnapshot

      public ViewData restoreSnapshot(BoardStateSnapshot snapshot)
      Restores the board to a previous snapshot.
      Parameters:
      snapshot - the snapshot to restore
      Returns:
      updated ViewData after restoration
